nodes.text: The Imperial Dropship was a vessel of the Galactic Empire. The starship was unarmed, with the rear featuring a detatchable troop transport platform that carried a couple of stormtroopers. The dropship's front had a windowed cockpit that housed a single shadow trooper pilot. Each side of the craft contained two holders for blasters or other equipment. Dark blue, grey, and black in color, the dropship's detatchable stormtrooper platform featured the Imperial crest on each side. The top of the vessel also featured the crest.

The Imperial Dropship was first included as a LEGO toy set from 2008. An updated version of the set was released in 2019 in celebration of the 20th anniversary of the LEGO Star Wars line. The set's package cover depicts an Imperial Dropship operating on a desert, where it was piloted by a shadow trooper and ferried two stormtroopers. Next to the vessel was a stormtrooper who fired towards the direction the dropship was facing. The dropship later appeared in Playdemic's 2020 mobile game LEGO Star Wars Battles.
